definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to force/to compel/to approach or go towards/urgent/pressing

sentences.english: OCD patients feel compelled to repeat behaviours such as washing their hands.
sentences.chinese: 强迫症患者倍感强迫来重复一系列行为，如重复洗手。

sentences.english: Do you have any work habits that you can't get rid of outside of your job?
sentences.chinese: 你不工作的时候，有没有什么职业强迫症？

sentences.english: We tend to think of hypochondria as a kind of selfishness.
sentences.chinese: 我们倾向于将强迫症视为某种自私的表现。

sentences.english: “They develop a new obsession, ” Hullett says.
sentences.chinese: “她们患上了新的强迫症，”哈里特说。

sentences.english: In order to investigate the improved Hospital type Morita Therapy for OCD treatment effect, Morita therapy for OCD is adopted.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨改良家庭式森田疗法对强迫症的治疗效果。

sentences.english: I thought it is Uncle who obsessively "badmouth" China.
sentences.chinese: 我想是山姆大叔强迫症地诽谤中国。

sentences.english: However, collecting can become an obsession, especially among the vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 但收藏也可能演变成强迫症，尤其对心理脆弱者而言。

sentences.english: Take somebody who perhaps suffers from some sort of compulsion to wash his hands.
sentences.chinese: 就拿某些有洗手强迫症的人做例子。

sentences.english: The onset of obsessive-compulsive disorder often occurs in childhood and adolescence.
sentences.chinese: 强迫症的发病年龄通常在儿童或青少年时期。

sentences.english: Small dose of Olanzapine can be effectively used as a potentiator for obsessive compulsive disorder.
sentences.chinese: 小剂量奥氮平可作为增效剂用于治疗强迫症。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the efficacy and side effects of fluoxetine with clomipramine in treating 60 refractory obsessive - compulsive patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价氟西汀和氯米帕明对难治性强迫症的疗效。

sentences.english: “They develop a new obsession,” Hullett says.
sentences.chinese: “她们患上了新的强迫症，”哈里特说。

definition: trypophobia (abbr. for 密集恐懼症|密集恐惧症[mi4 ji2 kong3 ju4 zheng4])
(slang) (pun on 神經病|神经病[shen2 jing1 bing4]) crazy person/nutjob
